name: auto-os
description: Sistema de Gestao para Oficinas de Funilaria e Pintura

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate:dev: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend

author: Gabriel Magaton
